page.title: 17A Hotel in Banff
page.content:
************************************** **************************************
There are many hotels in and around the Banff area. One of these is The Seafield. It survives on discos, private functions and bar lunches. The owner said that being your own boss is hard work and time consuming, but good fun. The customers that come to the hotel come from all over Great Britain and abroad. The hotel is popular with teenagers because of the dicos they hold there. At the moment it is non-residential but plans are being made to have bedrooms installed. The Seafield Hotel is open 7 days a week. The bar closes at 12.00 on week days and 12.30 at weekends.
**************************************
